data.notes: If the ACCOUNT_LOCK feature is enable.
Lock user account. The user account will be lock if the maximum login attempt is reach.
IDP validate the user credentials and send back the result.
Show login form to the UI to collect his username and password for validation.

The maximum number of attempts has been reached.
If account lock feature is enable, the user account will be lock for few minutes.
The Password validation flow start here. The flow timeout can be tuned as well flow configurations.

agamaData.comment: Maximum attempts reached. Password validation failed!
Lock user account if needed or unlock if the expiration time  is over.
add entry in log file for successfull login attempt.
If user credentials is valid, the flow end successfully.
Maximum attempts reached. Password validation failed!
The login flow will end here with failure.
agamaData.logMessage: "The maximum login attempt has been reached!"

agamaData.comment: Log the successfull  used credentials retrieval.
Get an instance of PasswordService Class.
Create json variable for UI feedback.

agamaData.logMessage: "Start execution of the password validation flow."
